definition: France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Be strictly compliance with laws and regulations, and to ensure food safety from product design.
sentences.chinese: 严格遵守法律法规，食品安全从产品设计抓起。

sentences.english: In addition, AACM is now in the process of drafting safety regulations.
sentences.chinese: 另外，民航局现正为安全法规进行法律草拟。

sentences.english: According to legal effect and content, our compellent technical standards should be one of technique regulations.
sentences.chinese: 按照法律效力和内容，我国强制性标准就是技术法规。

sentences.english: Third, the law or regulation needs to be faithfully implemented by the central government.
sentences.chinese: 第三，该法律或法规必须由中央政府忠实地推行。

sentences.english: There is even a big fine if one disobeys the laws.
sentences.chinese: 要能有愉快的车程，遵守安全法规是很重要的。

sentences.english: F. Other the promotion behavior of all lawbreaking code.
sentences.chinese: 其他一切违反法律法规的推广行为。

sentences.english: The regulations also ban unregulated health practitioners from commissioning or formulating their own medicines.
sentences.chinese: 法规还严禁不合格的中医医生从业或配制自己的药方。

sentences.english: The rule of absolution for taking pities on destitution was related to relieving the disaster and reducing farm taxes and excising taxes.
sentences.chinese: 蠲恤则例是指救灾扶荒与蠲减税赋方面的法规或准则。

sentences.english: No one knows what regulations apply to crypto-equity yet.
sentences.chinese: 没有人知道什么样的法规能适用于加密股权。

sentences.english: The paper concludes with some suggestions for the development of China' s rural planning laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 文尾提出对我国乡村规划法规建设的一些建议。

sentences.english: The new law also still gives rights of guardianship entirely to fathers and grandfathers.
sentences.chinese: 在新法规中父亲和爷爷依然保持着监护权。

sentences.english: This database presents and links to English-language information about HIV/AIDS-related statutes from countries in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 本数据库主要提供亚洲各国与艾滋病有关的法律法规。

sentences.english: The offense of conspiracy is a kind of concurrence of articles of law.
sentences.chinese: 阴谋犯是一种法规竞合犯的形态。

sentences.english: The regulatory environment may require that external bodies undertake monitoring and auditing.
sentences.chinese: 法规环境可要求由外部组织进行监控与稽核。

sentences.english: The following table generalizes some of the security requirements from common regulatory compliances.
sentences.chinese: 下面的表格归纳了常见法规遵从性的一些安全需求。

sentences.english: Next, that agreement has to be codified into binding law or regulations.
sentences.chinese: 下一步是，该协议必须转变为有约束力的法律或法规。

definition: provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
norm/standard/specification/regulation/rule/within the rules/to fix rules/to regulate/to specify
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
to issue/to proclaim/to enact (laws, decrees etc)
